headline: Can I Have A Reason To Buy Dow Inc. (DOW)? Asks Jim Cramer
summary: We recently published 12 Latest Stocks On Jim Cramer’s Radar. Dow Inc. (NYSE:DOW) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently discussed. Dow Inc. (NYSE:DOW)’s shares are among the worst performers on the stock market in 2025 as they have lost 40% year-to-date. The firm has struggled due to sluggishness in the broader industrial sector […]
